CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing SkyFlow Water Index relative to GeoHeat Commodity?
SRP.A: SkyFlow Water Index is {above} GeoHeat Commodity in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Power Futures relative to TerraFuel Exchange?
SRP.A: Solara Power Futures is {below} TerraFuel Exchange in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing GeoHeat Commodity relative to SkyFlow Water Index?
SRP.A: GeoHeat Commodity is {below} SkyFlow Water Index in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {GeoHeat Commodity}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total natural gas prices?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {AquaSource Trading}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Solara Power Futures's minimum Natural Gas Prices in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Solara Power Futures's minimum Natural Gas Prices is in {1983}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is TerraFuel Exchange's minimum Natural Gas Prices in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: TerraFuel Exchange's minimum Natural Gas Prices is in {1985}.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1983, did the total Natural Gas Prices experience a larger or smaller change than between 1989 and 1994?
NC.A: The change in total natural gas prices between 1982 and 1983 was {smaller} than between 1989 and 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Natural Gas Prices in 1990 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total natural gas prices in 1990 was {lower} than in 1995.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1990, was the average total Natural Gas Prices higher or lower than between 1983 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total natural gas prices between 1985 and 1990 was {higher} than between 1983 and 1987.

NC.Q: Was the total Natural Gas Prices in 1987 higher or lower than in 1995?
NC.A: The total natural gas prices in 1987 was {lower} than in 1995.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {GeoHeat Commodity} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Solara Power Futures and SkyFlow Water Index first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Solara Power Futures and SkyFlow Water Index did not exchange leading positions.
